title: HIGH-WAIST JACQUARD TROUSERS
description: High-waist trousers made of a viscose blend. Featuring belt loops and elastic at the back. Front pockets and rear patch pockets, a wide-leg fit and metal hook, button and zip fastening at the front.

title: TIE-DYE STRAIGHT LEG TROUSERS
description: High-waist trousers with belt loops. Side pockets and rear false welt pockets. Straight-leg design. Front zip fly, button and metal hook fastening.

title: SATIN CAMISOLE DRESS
description: V-neck midi dress with thin straps that cross at the back. Invisible zip fastening.

title: FLOWING SATIN SHIRT
description: Collared V-neck shirt with long sleeves and a button-up front.

title: SHORT TEXTURED WEAVE BLAZER
description: Cropped blazer with a lapel collar and long sleeves. False front buttoned flap pockets. Textured fabric. Lining. Raised metal button fastening at the front.

title: SHAWL COLLAR BLAZER WITH BELT
description: Shawl collar blazer with long sleeves. Featuring front pockets, welt chest pockets, a tie belt in the same fabric, lining and hidden button fastening at the front.

title: SHORT KNOTTED DRESS
description: Short dress with a plunging V-neckline. Puff sleeves falling below the elbow. Knot detail at the waist. Buttoned opening at the back.

title: RUFFLED SHIRT DRESS
description: Short dress made of cotton. Round neck and long sleeves with elasticated trim. Tie belt in the same fabric. Contrast visible topstitching detail. Ruffled hem. Button-up front.

title: DRESS WITH CUTWORK EMBROIDERY
description: Short dress featuring a surplice neckline, sleeves falling below the elbow with elasticated cuffs, contrast cutwork embroidery details and an elasticated waist.

title: LACE UP WEDGE HEEL SHOES
description: Espadrilles-style slingback shoes in crochet fabric. High wedge heel. Fabric straps for a tied closure around the ankle.
